system.availability: The Calixian Infantryman's Portable Communications Transcription Device is a device allowing a multifaceted near silent visual-kinetic communication employed in the absence of voxcasters. Imploring use of staining liquid, breaking metal, or Fissionable Material it may be applied upon any rough surface, leaving a recognisable imprint.
system.cost: Also known as a Pen/Pencil. Poor version fails 20% of the time, requires +10 Tech-Use Test to fix. Best Works in space and has multiple colours.
